channel.title: math.OA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.OA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Weighted weak $(1,1)$ estimate for non-commutative square function
item.description: arXiv:2410.00987v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: In this article, we consider weighted weak type $(1,1)$ inequality for certain square function associated to differences of ball averages and martingale in the non-commutative setting. This establishes a weighted version of main result of \cite{hong2021noncommutative}.
item.dc:creator: Samya Kumar Ray, Diptesh Saha
